overview: Tim Shields has 20 years experience in the information technology industry and through his expertise will be able to deliver ease of use, stability and functionality that will result in profitable operation of Technogenics systems from the start. Tim Consulted on infrastructure implementation and setup on such platforms as Windows NT 3.51 through Server 2008 including Active Directory, IIS and Exchange. He designed and implemented infrastructures featuring Novell, Citrix, and a multitude of UNIX platforms including OpenBSD, FreeBSD, a variety of Linux distributions, AIX, HPUX, UNIX, and Solaris. Tim has conducted assignments with clients such as the United States Department of Justice, several boards of education, healthcare companies, and Law firms. http://www.technogenics.com/
